item.title: Tracking Joey Wendle's rookie season with gganimate
item.description: Introduction This past weekend I got the chance to go to the Tampa Bay Rays vs Cleveland Indians game. This game was a ton of fun, made even more exciting for me - and by the end of the game, the people in my section - because my brother-in-law’s brother (does that make him my brother-in-law too? No one ever knows for sure…), Joey Wendle, plays for the Rays! In case you haven’t been paying attention, Joey has been having a MASSIVE rookie season.
